product_entries.full_product_description: Installation, testing and commissioning of miscellaneous surface mounted industrial/FLP control gear such as lighting/power panel, push button stations, motor starter, communication equipment, junction boxes, panels, plugs, sockets, including supply of necessary hardware, touch up painting including supply of paint, including transportation from store/yard to site at the place of installation, unpacking, (excluding fixing of cable glands and cable terminations),  including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. Weight of the unit up to 5 kg.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: mounting: surface mounted, type: industrial, type: flp(flameproof), includes: lighting/power panel, push button stations, motor starter, communication equipment, junction boxes, panels, plugs, sockets, hardware: necessary hardware, painting: touch up painting including supply of paint, transportation: from store/yard to site, unpacking: included, cable glands and terminations: excluded, labour and materials: all included, as per: approved drawings, specifications of this tender, directions of engineer-in-charge

original_rows.3: Installation, testing and commissioning of miscellaneous surface mounted industrial/FLP control gear such as lighting/power panel, push button stations, motor starter, communication equipment, junction boxes, panels, plugs, sockets, including supply of necessary hardware, touch up painting including supply of paint, including transportation from store/yard to site at the place of installation, unpacking, (excluding fixing of cable glands and cable terminations),  including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge.

Supply, installation, cable termination, connection, testing and commissioning of following types of FLP and  WP junction boxes, as per EIL specification No. 6-51-0061, including all labours and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge.
FLP(II A/II B) and WP 3 way JB complete with 3 Nos. FLP cable glands and 1 Nos. blocking plug suitable for cables upto 3 x 2.5 sq. mm YWY / XWY cable.
FLP(II A/II B) and WP 4 way JB complete with 4 Nos. FLP cable glands and 2 Nos. blocking plug suitable for cables upto 3 x 2.5 sq. mm YWY / XWY cable.
